website_summaries.verdict: A highly popular, reverse osmosis under-the-sink system that produces alkaline, mineralized water free of 1,000 contaminants.
pros: Loved for its “6-stage” technology that replaces essential minerals the other RO systems strip out
Water tastes as good as bottled water
Low TDS and ppm results as well as higher pH
Filter removes 99% of harmful contaminants, including lead and fluoride
cons: Faucet might leal, and some say the alkaline machine makes water more acidic

customer_reviews.title: Nick thanks for a great product. This is my 5th system that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Nick thanks for a great product. This is my 5th system that I have installed in my house over the years,and this is the first time ever that I was not frustrated with leaks and connections that just did not fit properly. Because of where I have this installed it is rather difficult to get to, and therefore having no leaks at all when I turned it on was very much appreciated. As you can see from my photos this was a difficult location between two cabinets, no leaks hurray! The purified water has the best taste of any reverse osmosis system that I have tried. Great product, and I highly recommend this system for trouble free great water.
customer_reviews.author: gdsilverman

customer_reviews.title: Housings will eventually leak. Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: The white filter housings developed pin holes on the bottoms. Super difficult to find the leak, but sure enough leaking through pin holes in the bottom of both of the white housings. This was after over a year of use, but still not acceptable and did a number on my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Grier

customer_reviews.title: During installation I performed all the flushing that was recommended and everything ran clear
customer_reviews.text: Still struggling after a month of use with milky colored water for the first 10 to 15 seconds. During installation I performed all the flushing that was recommended and everything ran clear. I am nut sure if the water is saturated with tiny bubbles causing the white looking water, or is this from one of the filter stages. There does not seem to be any taste difference, but my family won't drink it. Seems a waste to have to run the filter 10-15 seconds each time just to get a clear glass of water.
customer_reviews.author: David Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Beware of leaks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product Feb. 22, 2017 and although we included a tray under the filtration system to catch any leaks, we did not do so under the tank. The tank valve (or tank itself) failed and leaked water everywhere. Place trays under both products!!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Proprietary Filters - disguised as normal a RO set up.
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, but I just figured out that it actually has proprietary filters, they are very close to traditional but they will not work with any non Ispring filters. HUGE disappointment if you want ever want to change this up or tune it for your water you are out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher and Julianne

customer_reviews.title: Acidic water?
customer_reviews.text: Had it professionally installed. It looks nice but the water is far from Alkaline, it’s actually acidic! The TDS reading I’m getting is about 15ppm. So I think it’s filtering, but I don’t see much as far as remineralization. I hope the company responds to this review. This is BS. I spent $200 plus $200 installation for acid water?
customer_reviews.author: mike stern

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: System installed. Water looks not clean enough. When installing, at lease two concerns found: 1, The wet membrane filter smells nasty, bad smell. 2, one of three filter housings looks not brand new, some dirt in the housing threads.
customer_reviews.author: not smart

customer_reviews.title: Read this Warning from the Vendor's own website
customer_reviews.text: This is from iSpring's website. "WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including lead which is known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm" Amazon selling a water filtration system that may be releasing lead into the filtered water. This is all you need to know about this product.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Crappy taste
customer_reviews.text: Horrible tasting water. Also when I tried to run the tank empty for the first time, it kept going and going like the system wasn't even filtering, just ran the tap water through. Very disappointed with it. I had a 4 stage Premier filter before moving to the new place - it had the best tasting water ever.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lakes

customer_reviews.title: No customer support
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how well the filter works yet but customer support is non existent. I called with problems during the install but it went straight to voicemail during working hours. I left a message and didn’t call a call back thru most of the day. I tried again hours later but my call went straight to voicemail once again. I did finally managed to get the job finished in time to go to bed. I’m hoping the product is better than customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent PPM
customer_reviews.text: Some days the PPM will be 30 the next moment it would jump to 150 then it would jump to 300 sometimes. Also tank pressure was not calibrated properly so I had to do it by myself with a bike pump and the water flow is still very slow. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Zamin

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit, but manufacturer would not respond regarding defective parts.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is decent and the kit is very well considered. I am a handy person, and I had no issues with the installation itself. However, right out of the box the faucet was leaking, as well as the splitter supply valve. The manufacturer initially replied to my email, but then communication stopped entirely. I ended up having to go out and purchase replacement parts on my own to get the system in working order again. overall, I would recommend seeking a unit from a different manufacturer so that if there is an issue, they will be there to stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: Filter housing Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Chased this for a while. There is a Leak in the filter housing that is spraying a fine mist of water. The spray mist doesn't show unless the system is pressurized. System is about 18 moths old.. I'm guessing this is a 'thin wall' defect in the either the original mold or the injection molding process.
customer_reviews.author: HTMF Metal

customer_reviews.title: Too much drained water.. Too much waste of water.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed it for couple days ago and placed the drain water pipe into sink to see how much water is being drained. It drains almost non stop. For every glass of filtered water I get it drains almost 1 gallon of water. Too much waste of water. Manufacturer, please response. This much of water waste is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan J

customer_reviews.title: Broken parts, no answer from ISpring.
customer_reviews.text: Tank valve leaks from the valve stem, no answer from ISpring about the issue. Three days later, ISpring finally responded. They agreed to send a new tank valve, which just got here yesterday, 11 days after the fact. Guess what, they sent the wrong part! It's an inline valve they sent, instead of a tank valve! Stay away folks, and never again!
customer_reviews.author: Marie A.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy them
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this filter, ever. Here are the reasons: - this filter has caused flooding twice at our house. - when we called iSpring they had pathetic cc to support installation or send a plumber with installation skills. Long story short the water pipe burst open when we were on vacation ...this caused us lot of stress and thousands of dollars in water ramediation. Don't buy these cheap filters prone to flooding your kitchen and house.
customer_reviews.author: deepak

customer_reviews.title: Very disapointed.
customer_reviews.text: We are EXTREMELY disappointed. We just purchased this iSpring water filter (iSpring RCC7AK 6-Stage) and I installed it yesterday, Jan. 25, 2020. As soon as I run the water through the system, there was a strong leak through the fitting that takes the water our of the three lower filters and takes it up to the next set of filters, the membrane, etc. The leak is not from the side of the tube, but from the side that comes from the filter housing, right below the sign that says "OUT". The quality is NOT good, the material is not good as well and we were never able to actually use it because of the leak.
customer_reviews.author: haukaropora

customer_reviews.title: 3 year update
customer_reviews.text: Mine just passed the 3 year mark and several fittings broke so they are not eligible for the warranty replacement. I have only been able to use it for 2 of the 3 years because of issues with leaks and problems replacing the filters. It is now an expensive piece of junk and I am having to spend lots of money to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Lula Bee

customer_reviews.title: Got used item!!
customer_reviews.text: FIRST!! I GOT USED ITEM.. YOU CAN SEE PHOTOS.. I SPENT 1.5 HRS TO INSTALL, BECAUSE IT IS USED, SOME O RINGS WAS DAMAGED.. THANKS GOD THERE WAS SPARE RINGS IN THE BOX.. NOW WAITING FOR FILL THE TANK, I CHECKED WATER LEVELS.. BEFORE FILTER IT WAS 330 AFTER 10 MINS IT WAS 75.. LET'S SEE... I'LL UPDATE FOR THE TASTE
customer_reviews.author: merv

customer_reviews.title: Started out great, now just wasting water.
customer_reviews.text: For the first 3 months everything worked great. Then I noticed the system draining large amounts of water from the reservoir tank while the system is not being used. The system should only be draining water when filling the tank after use, but for some reason it's just flushing the full tank periodically. This is a new occurrence and has increased my water bill significantly. I have opened a ticket but never got a response. I was very excited about this product and am bummed that I wasted so much money on it.
customer_reviews.author: timdawns

customer_reviews.title: Super Difficult to Maintain
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few RO systems and consider myself a pretty fair DIY'er, but this system has humbled me. RO systems are a pain to begin with, but with this one, every six months, it always ends up taking two hours to replace all the filters and requires a call or two to customer support. Matters weren't helped by their changing the connectors on these to "quick connect." Just wait till you have to disconnect... Water quality is good. Water pressure is fair and after changing the filters it sputters for a good week or two afterwards making you wonder if you did it the right way.
customer_reviews.author: Calexander16

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Time
customer_reviews.text: I should have followed the recommendation of the other bad reviews. I personally hooked it up. Added into the draining pipes. etc. I was all excited to try the water and the minute calibrated it, it started leaking and would not stop. Identifying the leak, i used the replacement parts, but it started leaking in other places. I returned it for a full refund and went another direction. Second choice I installed and it hasn't leaked for 2+ months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: The fitting has a hair line crack causing it to leak, warranty has not been met. Extras fittings that came with the kit cannot be used to replace the faulty fitting as it will leak from the inlet side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faucet leaks at the handle, Amazon wont send a replacement
customer_reviews.text: As i said the Faucet leaks at the handle, Amazon or ispring has acknowledged me to replace the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks! Customer service is non responsive
customer_reviews.text: Part of the system was cracked and leaking right out of the box. It was a gift and the recipients didn't tell me about it until today. I will contact the manufacturer to see what can be done. Other than that (they have a bowl under it) they love the taste and quality of the water. I will give a review update when the situation is resolved. UPDATE*** I have emailed the customer service department and so far, no response. I’ve attached a brief video to show the location and flow rate of the leak. It is right in the elbow of that piece and impossible to plug. I don’t recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Alten

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, did it in a Saturday Morning. You are going to need a 1/2 inch diamond hole saw bit if you have marble counter tops. Start your hole at an angle and then straighten out the drill, plenty of youtube videos out there on that. The faucet that came with the kit had a slow leak from the on/off valve (above the counter). I contacted iSpring directly and told them about the leak and Nick from iSpring support sent me out a new faucet free of charge. I installed it a few days ago and no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: charles a zangla

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: The unit was installed by professionals. They told me that 1in 5 units had leaks with the remineralization component. And that mine was one of them. It leaked. So I had to deal with i spring and request a new one. Then I had to get the installers back to fix it. Really sad there is a known issue but they keep shipping these out broken and leave it to the customer to resolve the issue. What did iSpring do for the trouble, other then send me a new part? Nothing. Don’t buy! Also there is a large tank with this unit not shown in the pictures. Takes up way more space then you think.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P Dyer

customer_reviews.title: membrane container leaking
customer_reviews.text: after install the system, noticed membrane container leaking at the cover of the container even after replaced seal ring in the cover.
customer_reviews.author: John kong

customer_reviews.title: Very Difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: This water filtration system does produce good tasting water, but putting it in is a nightmare period it is ridiculously complicated, even though they argue that it is easy to install. they give you a small novel to read through and the only way to really figure it out is to watch the videos and then go step by step, but it is complex and very time-consuming to do it. It still is not clear to me how to keep track of maintaining the filters. You just want to throw up your hands. If you can figure it out, it works fine, and I do feel that it is priced reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse currie

customer_reviews.title: Unclear instructions and poor taste!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are not clear. My husband and I are no strangers to plumbing and have redone most of the plumbing in our house ourselves during our remodeling, yet with the unclear instructions it took us a long time to install this and there was much guess work. After installing and running the new system start up process, we finally tasted the water and it’s nasty. It tastes like cheap bottled water (go buy the cheapest bottled purified water you can find and that’s what this tastes like). We had a pitcher to filter water prior to this and it tasted great, even though it claims to filter less. I’m so disappointed by the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Privette

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces UPDATE- GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Well we would love to write a review of how this functions but after getting it mostly installed discovered missing pieces. So it is non functional for now. In the process of tracking down the missing parts and if we do, I’ll update this review to reflect our new impressions of it. UPDATE!!! Nick helped us and was absolutely wonderful and we now have everything we need and it is installed and working perfectly!! Absolutely love our clean fresh fluoride free water, it is AMAZING! Highly recommend. Thank you Nick!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GHF

customer_reviews.title: It's probably 5 stars, but mine leaked out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The RO system has been installed in my home for about a week. The instructions were surprisingly clear, and it took me a couple hours to install the system. I probably would have given it 5 stars, but my system leaked out the box (the alkaline filter). I thought, ok, let me follow the instructions they included... don't return the system, contact the manufacturer! I did exactly that, but they've simply ignored me. I guess I might just return the system after all and buy another one. A bit disappointing... It's probably pretty good. Edit: Raising to 4 stars. They did eventually reply and send me a new filter, 2 weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Everything is fine except the HUGE amount of drain water
customer_reviews.text: Well, it took some time to install, but it is not that difficult. The TDS of the filtered water has reduced from about 480 ppm to about 50 ppm, as advertised. However, this waste a HUGE amount of drain water! They claim that it will take about 3 gallon of drain water for every 1 gallon of filtered one. But we noticed the drain water has TDS of 520 ppm and through simple calculation, the drain water required would be at least 8 times! And it matches with our observation. Anyway, I guess that is the feature of Reverse Osmosis, which I think is not environment friendly. But other than that, it is working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Yini Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Raised the tap water ph to 11.5
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and was very excited to try it. I got it installed watched all the installation videos about draining it. Did everything and the ph was around 11.5 I thought this was because of something I did so I bought replacement filters and tossed the original ones thinking that would fix it. I test it and sure enough it’s still raising the ph by about 2-3 points when it’s supposed to lower it. Now I have to talk to the manufacturer about getting a refund because I’m not going to drink 11.5ph water
customer_reviews.author: Mloveland

customer_reviews.title: Non existent customer service on a poor quality product.
customer_reviews.text: RO was constantly draining water. Wasted water for a whole day. Submitted a ticket for service to Ispring but customer service is basically non existent. Looked up what might cause the issue in their website and they said a couple of things. Mostly defective parts. But it doesn’t matter since they have no customer support. Buy a different brand. Just wasted half a day trying to install this poor quality product.
customer_reviews.author: John Rambo

customer_reviews.title: ... it since the fittings it comes with break very easily. I contacted the Ispring Customer Service by phone ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered it and haven`t been able to use it since the fittings it comes with break very easily. I contacted the Ispring Customer Service by phone and after several calls and no answer, I tried the email. It has been few weeks and still waiting for an answer. I was going to return it but the 30 day period passed, from all the waiting I have been doing. UPDATE I have been able to contact Customer Service and they are sending replacement parts as part of the warranty. I will be updating again after installing and using the filter.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent filter and water flavor and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this filter in May 2018 and had it installed professionally after realizing upon arrival of the package that I lacked the required skills to install it on my own. The installer had no difficulty following the instructions and commented that the instructions were very clear and complete. Around July 2020, the filter faucet started dripping. This type of faucet cannot be repaired and the only solution is to replace it. I emailed Support at the iSpring company and received a free replacement faucet because the warranty covers the faucet for 3 years from the purchase date. Nick at iSpring was very helpful and mailed the replacement without delays.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced, good water
customer_reviews.text: 1. Instructions are mostly clear--the water detector part should have been included in the step by step guide and the connector info could have been better drafted. Not that hard to figure out if you're deliberate 2. 2 hours to install, mainly because I kept double checking steps. 3. The saddle is meant for a 1.5 inch disposal line. I have a 2 inch disposal line and it still fit, hopefully it won't snap in the long term. Company doesn't offer a 2 inch version, so they lose a star for that. 4. Water had a fishy taste for the first 3 tankfuls, then finally got better. I'm guessing the mineral filter was a factor, but don't know why.
customer_reviews.author: vinkush

customer_reviews.title: Leaking after 20 days!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I liked it so much as the system was very convenient and the water was great. I even recommended to my friends. But it started to leak after 20 days of use. I tried to see where the water came from at first. Then I'm sure that it came from the system as I put a baking dish to hold the filters and the a lot of water in the dish now. It took me 2 hours to install the whole system and even drilled a hole in my pipe. Now it's about to ruin my under sink cabinet and leaves a big hole in my pipe if I remove it. Super disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lily L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: When we moved into our home the water in our area tastes awful. We started buying a lot of bottled water and making sure it had at least a pH Balance of 7.5 to 8. It was costing us a lot of money every month. My husband found iSpring RCC7AK 6-Stage with a alkaline system. What an awesome system and we are so happy with this product. Not only does our water taste great, with a perfect pH balance, we are saving so money on not buying bottled water👍
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C.

customer_reviews.title: leak
customer_reviews.text: leaked from the start, too many connections got me thinking of more chances of water damage to my cabinet i returned it
customer_reviews.author: DMan

customer_reviews.title: YOU CAN DO IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the iSpring RCC7AK at the end of 2017and put off the installation for over 2 1/2 years! I was not looking forward to the installation because I thought it would be like opening a can of worms with unforeseen issues and difficulties. I finally installed it and I regret that I didn't install it earlier. It was actually pretty easy. There were no missing parts and in fact, the product came with extra parts that you may lose, like clips and connectors. Overall an excellent product with great instructions and solid connectors that don't leak. The high ratings that this product has is very well deserved. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TXSURFER

customer_reviews.title: High quality materials and user friendly install
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly worried about the difficulty of the installation, but the accompanying documentation was excellent and there are some online videos that helped as well. Install was pretty easy and I'd probably be able to do it much faster a second time. It's only been a day since I've had the system up and running, so I can't speak to reliability or performance, but so far the system is performing as expected. The water tastes clean, the pressure is very good and no leaks! The faucet it comes with is very nice and compliments our kitchen well. Update: customer service is great. They responded to some questions I had and have been very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Plant Man

customer_reviews.title: Quality Filter, Taste Great, and Awesome Support
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in 2016 and works great. Recently I had to move so I need replacement parts. Emailed iSpring for support and they had sent me the parts for free even though it has been over 4 year. Awesome service and they had delivered beyond expectation. I highly recommend iSpring.
customer_reviews.author: Allan T.

customer_reviews.title: It has been more than a month I installed still when I opened the first time quality is bad,
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of those water quality testers, I check when I first open it shows more than 60 particles so the quality is bad, after I run the water like 20 sec, than it goes down to 20 which seems it's drinkable. It has been more than 45 days still first time I opened the quality is bad! I am wondering if those reviews are fake... Just wanted to warn who wants to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Cenkc

customer_reviews.title: YES, YES, AND MORE YES!
customer_reviews.text: O.M.G.!! Look no further! This RO system is amazing! This is our first time purchasing and experiencing an RO system and let me tell you, this thing is the bomb.com! The written instructions, video and pictures make it easy for all learning types. It was incredibly easy to install. In addition, the water tastes amazing! I was not paid for this review, the product is just THAT good! Rarely do companies include instructions that make sense and are easy to follow. 10000% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: BTWD

customer_reviews.title: RO Membrane Fails After <1 Year
customer_reviews.text: The unit is OK for this price range. Did not have any issues installing or maintaining. One ongoing problem has been the RO membrane itself. The first one failed after a year. The mfg. replaced it under warranty "as a courtesy". The second failed a year later. The water was tasking funny, checked it with a TDS tester, we're over 400 now. Same as the incoming water.
customer_reviews.author: VSM

customer_reviews.title: Great taste , design and quality !!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking of installing RO, this is it!!! Water tastes fresh & clean. We did not have any difficulty installing. The look and design of the spout is sleek and modern. We initially got the nickel finish but our faucet and hardware on our wet bar is all matte black. I called them to see if I can purchase a black finish separately, and Nick was kind enough to send one to me for free. I just had to pay $10 for shipping. So if you have black or another color finish in your Kitchen and worried it won’t match, just get in touch with Nick and he will help you out. Amazing service, Very friendly!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Poor shape from the factory
customer_reviews.text: This product when I went to install every joint in it was leaking I work in the trades so I am able to repair it but no homeowner should have to get a product in this state. Even if the product turns out to be fine I cannot give it a good review because of the state it was in when I received it. if it springs one more leak within the allotted time it’s been returned
customer_reviews.author: Eamonn McDonagh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and support!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of an ISpring RO filter, which came along with the purchase of my second home. The first model we had worked very well, and we found the install and maintenance of the unit to be very manageable. We just got finished with the installation of this unit, which was even easier than the last. We did encounter an issue with the threads on one of the adapter valves, but the Customer Service agent named Brian was an awesome help, and shipped us out an upgraded replacement adapter quickly at no cost. I’m pretty sold on these filters, and will be recommending them to others going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE** So I love this!!! My water went from 930ish to 50ish def worth the investment!! I hope this review helps I added the pictures of my water and the filtered water below. Well got it delivered super quick hank you so much for that!! It was insanely easy to put in seriously really easy. I'll post more pictures of my water test. My tap water is totally contaminated like above 900ppm and the fridge filter is around 600ppm. Crossing my fingers on the numbers going down on this. I'll add more picture to update you.
customer_reviews.author: Cussin Irish

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this unit and relied on Amazon Best Choice. I couldn't be happier. I read the instructions and then started the you tube video, paused at each step until completed. The video depicted my product exactly with the exception of drain and faucet connections. These were very minor differences. I had an issue with the water supply valve fitting between the water supply and faucet due to my sink being so deep. I had to go to the hardware store and buy a brass 90 degree fitting. There was no teflon tape in my package but I keep that on hand. The installation took a little time but was very simple. I think anyone can accomplish this task.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product to feed both my sink and my fridge
customer_reviews.text: My friend told me how great these systems are and I had ordered a different brand and ended up returning that and buying this iSpring unit due to the lower cost of the filter replacements. I was very happy with the unit installation and I had some oily residue at the top of my water only because I did not run the water through the three initial filters long enough. Once I did that the oil went away. we now have wonderful tasting water and because of it I'm drinking water. I purchased the accessory kit to hook up my fridge which was very handy to have the splitter and some of the other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good system!
customer_reviews.text: Great water filtration system. It was easy to install. My husband followed the YouTube video so he did t need to read the instructions. The only part on the video that was not included or in the instructions was the “leak detector” but we figured it out. Great flavor. You can taste that the water get filtered. It tasted clean. Too clean. I usually add minerals to filtered water for “re-mineralization”. Since reverse osmosis strips the water making it acidic, this one does not taste too mineralized but we did test the ph and it was alkalinized so that works for me. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: LoveMe

customer_reviews.title: Oily sheen on water
customer_reviews.text: There is an oily sheen on top of every glass of water I pour. I have flushed the system and tank several times and after two days the sheen is still there, every glass. I have contacted customer service but haven't heard back yet. I will update when this is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Henriquez

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!  RO water is well worth the initial cost.
customer_reviews.text: I inherited a pre-plumbed kitchen sink for RO water. With that in mind, everything took less than an hour to install. Go to You Tube and search for the iSpring RO water installation video, there are a few to choose from. It truly doesn’t get any easier than that. So far so good. NO LEAKS at this time. I really don’t expect any either. The entire system was easy to install. Looks good and feels solid. iSpring took the time to build a great looking system. I’ll come back and revise my review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: MARCUS

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this product. Currently uninstalling due to it constantly draining. Drains 24/7 after a few months of installing. Water bill more than doubled.
customer_reviews.author: Blayne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water/eassy to install
customer_reviews.text: Loved it since day one. There are alot of filtration systems outhere and it was hard to choose one. So far we feel we have picked the right one. Great price and great water. I have never tasted water so fresh. The box included everything we needed to install and was able to conect it to the refrigerator ice maker. It includes simple to follow instructuons and the videos gives a great idea what to expect with the unboxing and installation. The hardest part was making a hole on my granite countertop but instructions tell you what size hole drill bit you will need.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Arroyo

customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Reverse Osmosis system with no real understanding of R/O systems or the installation requirements. The 1⁄4” water connections are easy to makeup and are somewhat dummy proof, if one follows the instructions. Not to mention waste water hose to the same drain as the water softener. The water has a noticeable taste differance and coffee is much better. City water was adequate- the RO made it great! Thanks again!

I did confront two minor water leaks but somehow wiggles the joints and it appears that work. Also I did not receive teflon tape although the instructions stated they were included. I spoke with Don and Nick at ispring during the fridge kit installation ( I had a few minor questions) and both were super helpful and extremely polite.

customer_reviews.title: Super High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with this purchase. I bought a very expensive professional unit 10 years ago. When I sold my house it stayed. I started researching upper-end units and was shocked at how much less they cost these days. I had this professionally installed. My installer owned this same unit. This one remineralizes the water in a 6th stage and it is worth the modest bump in price. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Takes up a lot of room under the sink.
customer_reviews.text: First, I've wanted an RO system for a LONG time! It took just over an hour to install, very easy instruction video on youtube if you not mechanically inclined, I am, but watched it any way. It comes with a very clear schematic and the color coordination of the hoses made it a breeze! I have used a zero water for a couple of years and love it, I used the probe to measure the water and it consistently reads 65 to 67 from the RO system which is perfect compared to none filtered water at 180. Very happy with this system.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drink water filtration system
customer_reviews.text: This is a one year review since I purchased and installed the ispring 6 stage system. Pro Started with tds score 180. After system it's down to 19. Easy to install Good quality system Clear instructions Great tasting water Con One of the filter leaked upon arrival. Had to purchase a replacement filter to fix the problem One year later system still maintained tds score under 20. (Still haven't had to change any filters)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent system for this price

With the TDS meter my tap water was in 300 range, after the installation and system flush - the TDS read 35-50. One suggestion - add a water meter before it gets to the faucet. product_meta.title: iSpring RCC7AK 6-Stage Superb Taste High Capacity Under Sink Reverse Osmosis Drinking Water Filter System with Alkaline Remineralization-Natural pH, White
product_meta.description:
Style:Filter System

As America's favorite brand of reverse osmosis systems, and backed by iSpring’s industry-leading customer support, the RCC7AK is unequaled in quality, performance, and durability. The system consists of 6-stage, layered filtration built around precision reverse osmosis (RO) technology that removes over 1000 different kinds of contaminants in order to provide the best home drinking water filtration available. Unlike some other systems, the combination of both GAC and CTO filters in the 2nd and 3rd stages provides extra layers of protection against harmful chemicals than CTO alone. It features a 75 gallon-per-day capacity RO membrane, which is larger than most in its class and provides the capacity to economically handle the drinking water needs of even a large family.

After flowing through the initial 5 stages of the iSpring RCC7 line of Reverse Osmosis filtering products, the RCC7AK model adds another Alkaline Remineralization (AK) stage. This stage is designed to restore the natural alkalinity and mineral balance of the water. The RO process effectively generates pure water but it also removes a few helpful minerals in the process. The red mineral stone portion of the AK filter adds back healthy minerals including not just calcium, but also other beneficial minerals, like magnesium, that other systems don't. The calcite portion of the filter neutralizes the pH of the RO water. And the water tastes better too. Because RO water is so pure, some people may find it tastes unnatural. Many people prefer the more natural taste that comes from the presence of some minerals in the water. Remineralization restores just the right proportion of healthy minerals.

Designed for do-it-yourself installation by most users, the entire system fits nicely under a standard kitchen sink. Installation is straightforward and all parts necessary for installation are included. You are guided by clear, well organized written instructions, instructional videos and access to iSpring’s unparalleled technical support. The system is quiet and low maintenance with no moving parts. Replacement filters are standard sized and sold at factory direct pricing. A lead-free, solid brass faucet with brushed nickel finish is included with the system and is usually mounted on the counter as the primary source of drinking water, but output lines can also be connected to your ice maker, coffee maker, etc. The whole system is backed by a 1-year money-back guarantee, a 1-year manufacturer warranty and iSpring's unique lifetime technical support provided right here in the USA in Alpharetta Georgia. With the iSpring RCC7AK, enjoy crisp-tasting, bottled quality water, every day, right in your home. 



 * Incoming Water Pressure: 45 PSI - 70 PSI
 * Operating water temperature range: 40 – 100 °F
 * Maximum TDS: 750 ppm

Install this RO system in a location where it is safe from hot/cold weather and direct sunlight. Avoid hitting, dropping, or dragging the system as this can cause cracks and leaks

BENEFITS: The iSpring RCC7AK water softener includes an additional sixth stage - an Alkaline Remineralization filter which restores healthy minerals and produces a balanced alkalinity, which gives your water a more natural taste than regular 5 stage RO water filter; the RO membrane removes not only harmful pollutants but also a few helpful minerals.
